products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Iron Mountain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Turning your home into the one place in the world you never want to leave is all about getting your interiors working in perfect harmony. With iron mountain (deluxe) from the kalmar range you'll be able to welcome a contemporary colour through your door and see how it works in perfect harmony with the natural grain of the materials. We love the idea of using iron mountain in the bathroom to help break up the sea of light colours and crisp whites.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With kalmar cool grey (deluxe) you'll be able to create a homely interior that is on-trend and right up to date with the latest colour trends. The off-white detailing of the grain is a great way to lighten the mood and take the edge off the dominant background colour. Turning the guest bedroom into the homely space that your friends and family will never want to leave is all about finding the right balance.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Windrift - Venetian Blind
products.description: Windrift is the latest addition to the kalmar range, and one that comes highly recommended for those of you looking to reinvent your decor. The gentle beige background serves as the perfect canvas for the whitened grain that shines through in all weathers. Turn the hard to decorate upstairs landing into one of the most pleasingly decorated spaces in your home with a light beige lampshade and matching piece of wall art.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.description: As your eye traces its way across kalmar barkley you'll see the natural way in which the stone greys and off-whites flow into one another. This is a design free of the rigid constraints of geometric patterns. Instead it finds its inspiration in the gently flowing patterns of wood grains. Turn the landing into the stylish transient space that you've always wanted with a little help from barkley. With a stone grey jug on a narrow side table and a rug along the landing you'll be able to bring everything together in perfect harmony.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.description: In a creamy ivory tone, the cotswold deluxe in oyster parades a subtly sheen paint on wide, sturdy slats with matching components. For flexible light, ventilation, and privacy, simply tilt the slats to your desired degree. Invite country sophistication into your home by teaming the oyster with vintage pinks and an accenting sage green in the master bedroom. Include light, naked woods and dreamy florals, dressing the bed linen with plush chenille throws and cushions for an added touch of luxe.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The cotswold deluxe in smoke grey is aptly named, with its high quality slats and matching components, including woven linen ladder ribbons for streamlined appeal. The slats are easily adjusted, allowing you to let in as much or as little light and air as you need. Build a stunningly unusual decor scheme in your home office by setting the smoke grey against a navy blue feature wall. Paint the remaining walls in white or matching pale grey and furnish the room with grey furniture and navy accessories.
